word: They think that they can better glorify God by going to a more needy field. This is their own choice; I have not persuaded them. They did not know but that Sister White would stand in their way. But when they laid the matter before me this morning, I told them that I would not hinder them for one moment.--Ms 54, 1904, pp. 2, 3, 5. (Remarks of E. G. White at Berrien Springs, May 23, 1904.)
